metadata.title: LaserGRBL
metadata.summary: LaserGRBL is one of the best Windows software for image Laser Engraving.
metadata.description:
LaserGRBL is able to load any image, pictures and logo and send to your laser engrave with few click.
Unlike other GUI, LaserGRBL it is specifically developed for use with hobbist laser cutter and engraver and could be a good free and easy alternative to picengrave, benbox, T2laser, lightburn for who donâ€™t need more then a simple and effective tool.
